Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.
The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving
throw, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13
Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on
itself on a success.

name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
